thread.title: Microsoft says iPhone users welcome in Apple Store-like 5th Ave Microsoft Store
thread.title_full: Microsoft says iPhone users welcome in Apple Store-like 5th Ave Microsoft Store - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Microsoft says iPhone users welcome in Apple Store-like 5th Ave Microsoft Store
text: After setting up shop just a few blocks away from Apple’s signature retail store on Manhattan’s Fifth Avenue, Microsoft says that iPhone users will be welcome to drop into the new Microsoft Store opening today, reports the NY Times. “If you bring your iPhone in here, I’d love to show you how to use Office on […] »
